div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1702 Asyut (anc. Lycopolis), 300 km. S of Cairo, 1936 Burial: c. 180 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4+ AR Ptolemy II: 2 tetradr. (Joppa, ANS 1944.100.76239 Ephesus ANS 1944.100.76252) Ptolemy V: 2 tetradr. (Salamis) ANS 1944.100.78688 ANS 1944.100.78687) Disposition: New York Unpublished; ANS file reference "Mallawi hoard," purchased from Khawan Bros.
